title: Outerfields: Netflix-Style Gated Membership Platform
description: Build a gated video platform with 7 content categories, 50+ videos, $99 lifetime membership, and Stripe/Calendly integrations

stories.title: Implement gated video playback system with 30-60 second previews
stories.description: Create VideoPlayer component that plays 30-60 seconds then shows subscription gate overlay. Gate should be smooth, professional, and clearly prompt $99 membership.
acceptance: VideoPlayer component plays video for 30-60 seconds for non-members
At time limit, video pauses and gate overlay fades in smoothly
Gate overlay shows 'Subscribe to continue watching' with value statement
Clear CTA button to $99 membership
Gate does NOT appear for authenticated members
Video resumes playback after successful subscription

stories.title: Create authentication system with member/non-member states
stories.description: Implement auth system that tracks membership status. Members see full videos, non-members see previews. Use Cloudflare D1 for user storage.
acceptance: Auth store tracks authentication state (authenticated, unauthenticated)
Auth store tracks membership status (member, non-member)
Login page at /login with email/password
Session persists in KV with 24-hour expiration
Middleware checks auth status on gated routes
Logout functionality clears session

stories.title: Build Stripe $99 lifetime membership checkout flow
stories.description: Integrate Stripe for one-time $99 payment. On success, grant lifetime membership access and redirect to welcome page.
acceptance: Pricing section shows single $99 lifetime membership option
CTA button 'Become a Founding Member - $99' redirects to Stripe Checkout
Stripe Checkout Session created with $99 one-time payment
Webhook at /api/stripe/webhook handles checkout.session.completed
On success, user record updated with membership: true
User redirected to /welcome with membership access
Welcome email sent with platform access instructions

stories.description: Implement 7 content categories: Crew Call (20+ eps), Reconnecting Relationships (3 eps), Kodiak (8 eps), Lincoln Manufacturing (7-8 eps), Guns Out TV (13 eps), Films (1), Coming Soon (5 trailers). Each category is a horizontal scroll row.
acceptance: CategoryRow component with horizontal scroll

stories.title: Create video content database with tiering metadata
stories.description: Set up Cloudflare D1 database with videos table. Store all 50+ videos with metadata: category, episode number, tier (free/preview/gated), duration, R2 asset path.
acceptance: D1 migration creates 'videos' table
